attributes.additional_details: teji express is a small local cafe specialising in the cooking and serving of Indian food, Not only is the food delicious, it's also a top place to visit not just for the incredible prices but the curries are very low fat, making them a top choice for those trying too lose weight without having to resort too a salad! The staff are very friendly and helpful and are devastated they are being forced too close due too complaints about the smell of the food.. Please save Teji express and allow them too continue trade!
